title: [Gameplay] Quinn's Q Still Blinds AAs
body: The recent Marksman update alterations to Quinn's kit remove the blind from her Q, replacing it instead with "nearsight" {[LoLWiki](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Quinn)}, which lowers your vision radius but doesn't prevent you from attacking anything.  However, on several occasions playing against a Quinn as Renekton, her Q has blinded me and stopped my W (an AA-based stun) from working;  even when I'm directly next to her in the reduced vision radius, I'll still get the "missed" text that you would from old Quinn. This is a very significant bug for Renekton players considering how essential the stun is to his kit.

replies.body: Yeah I've reported this as well. Its a problem with augmented auto attacks. It also fucks up fiora very hard as she can't e or proc vitals. They need to see this because it is huge.
